purpose.summary: This file defines the IMS Program Specification Block (PSB) named PSBPAUTL. It specifies a single Database PCB (PAUTLPCB) for the DBPAUTP0 database with PROCOPT=L (language interface processing), KEYLEN=14, sensitive to root segment PAUTSUM0 and child segment PAUTDTL1 under PAUTSUM0. The PSB is generated for assembler language (LANG=ASSEM).
purpose.business_context: Provides database access specification for IMS DL/I application programs processing PAUT (likely Payment Authority Utility) summary and detail data in DBPAUTP0 (inferred from DBDNAME and segment names; exact business process UNKNOWN)

business_rules.description: PCB PAUTLPCB is sensitive only to segments PAUTSUM0 (PARENT=0, root segment) and PAUTDTL1 (PARENT=PAUTSUM0, child segment)
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined using SENSEG statements under the PCB

business_rules.description: Accesses IMS database DBDNAME=DBPAUTP0 using PCB TYPE=DB
PROCOPT=L enables language interface processing (inquiry/update via DL/I calls); KEYLEN=14 defines key length for segment searches

open_questions.question: What IMS application programs reference this PSB (PSBPAUTL)?
open_questions.context: PSB name is specified but no calling programs mentioned in source
open_questions.suggestion: Check IMS application source code or PSB usage logs for references

open_questions.question: Exact business purpose of DBPAUTP0 database and segments PAUTSUM0/PAUTDTL1?
open_questions.context: Inferred from names (PAUT likely Payment Authority Utility, SUM0 summary, DTL1 detail) but not explicitly documented
open_questions.suggestion: Review DBD (Database Definition) source for DBPAUTP0 or associated application documentation
